techmeme.title: On Apple Pay's 10th anniversary, Apple adds support for Klarna in the US and UK and plans to expand installment loan options and add reward redemptions (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
Billing software company Zuora to be acquired by Silver Lake and GIC in a deal valued at $1.7B, an 18% premium to the closing price when acquisition talks began (Investing.com)
Unity announces the Unity 6 game engine, emphasizing stability, updates, and the ability to support hundreds of players in the same virtual world simultaneously (Kif Leswing/CNBC)
Paris Court of Appeal orders complete blocks of several porn websites, including Xhamster, for their failure to roll out solid age verification systems. (Klara Durand/Politico)
Private equity firm Permira acquires Squarespace after raising its bid to $7.2B; Squarespace sells restaurant reservation service Tock to Amex for $400M (Paul Sawers/TechCrunch)
